price: Enti monhwε na moango mo ho anyε sε deε morefrε wͻn akͻ asomdwoeԑ (apam) mu; na mo ne nkonimdifoͻ, Onyankopͻn ka mo ho, na Ɔmma mo nnwuma pa no so akatua so nte.
arabic: فَلَا تَهِنُواْ وَتَدۡعُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱلسَّلۡمِ وَأَنتُمُ ٱلۡأَعۡلَوۡنَ وَٱللَّهُ مَعَكُمۡ وَلَن يَتِرَكُمۡ أَعۡمَٰلَكُمۡ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: falā tahinū watadʿū ilā al-salmi wa-antumu al-aʿlawna wal-lahu maʿakum walan yatirakum aʿmālakum
